## Tile.getResourceInfo() method

Compute \[\[TileResourceInfo\]\] of this `Tile`<!-- -->. May be using a cached value. The method `invalidateResourceInfo` can be called beforehand to force a recalculation.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getResourceInfo(): TileResourceInfo;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

[TileResourceInfo](./harp-mapview.tileresourceinfo.md)

`TileResourceInfo` for this `Tile`<!-- -->.
